001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput;
005import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ECKey;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutPoint;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
010import org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey;
011import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
012import org.bitcoinj.wallet.DeterministicKeyChain;
013
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Optional;
016import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
017
018import static org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork.REGTEST;
019
020/**
021 * A "signing wallet"  that uses a {@link DeterministicKeyChain} to
022 * sign {@link SigningRequest}s.
023 */
024public class HDKeychainSigner implements BaseTransactionSigner {
025    private final DeterministicKeyChain keyChain;
026
027    public HDKeychainSigner(DeterministicKeyChain keyChain) {
028        this.keyChain = keyChain;
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Create a signed bitcoinj transaction from the signing request
033     * <p>
034     * NOTE: This was an attempt to use an unsigned transaction and a list of address.
035     * It is private and should not be used. I'm leaving it here because it demonstrates
036     * the use of `duplicateDetached()` and we may want to use this elsewhere to sign
037     * incomplete bitcoinj transactions.
038     * <p>
039     * Assumes all inputs are P2PKH (for now) and addresses must be in
040     * the same order as the unsigned inputs in the unsigned transaction.
041     * 
042     * @param addresses An ordered list of funding addresses (keys must be in HD keychain)
043     * @param unsignedTx An unsigned bitcoinj transaction
044     * @return a newly created, signed bitcoinj transaction
045     */
046    private CompletableFuture<Transaction> signTransaction(List<Address> addresses, Transaction unsignedTx) {
047        if (addresses.size() != unsignedTx.getInputs().size()) {
048            throw new IllegalArgumentException("addresses and inputs must be 1:1 mapped");
049        }
050        NetworkParameters netParams = unsignedTx.getParams();
051
052        // Create a new, empty bitcoinj transaction
053        Transaction tx = new Transaction(netParams);
054
055        // For each output in the signing request, add an output to the bitcoinj transaction
056        // TODO: Transaction validation
057        for (TransactionOutput output : unsignedTx.getOutputs()) {
058            tx.addOutput(output.duplicateDetached());
059        }
060
061        // For each address in the input list, add a signed input to the bitcoinj transaction
062        for (int index = 0; index < unsignedTx.getInputs().size(); index++) {
063            Address address = addresses.get(index);
064            TransactionInput input = unsignedTx.getInputs().get(index);
065            TransactionOutPoint outPoint = input.duplicateDetached().getOutpoint();
066            DeterministicKey fromKey = keyChain.findKeyFromPubHash(address.getHash());
067            tx.addSignedInput(outPoint, ScriptBuilder.createOutputScript(address), input.getValue(), fromKey);
068        }
069        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(tx);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Return the signing key for an input, if available
074     * @param input Transaction input data
075     * @return Signing key, if available, {@link Optional#empty()} otherwise.
076     */
077    public Optional<ECKey> keyForInput(TransactionInputData input) {
078
079        return Optional.ofNullable(
080                keyChain.findKeyFromPubHash(input.script().getPubKeyHash())
081        );
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Return the signing key for an input, if available
086     * @param pubKeyHash pubKeyHash
087     * @return Signing key, if available, {@link Optional#empty()} otherwise.
088     */
089    public Optional<ECKey> keyForHash(byte[] pubKeyHash) {
090
091        return Optional.ofNullable(
092                keyChain.findKeyFromPubHash(pubKeyHash)
093        );
094    }
095
096    public Optional<ECKey> pubKeyFromPubKeyHash(byte[] pubKeyHash) {
097        return keyForHash(pubKeyHash).map(ECKey::fromPublicOnly);
098    }
099}
